statements: SELECT * FROM user_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email, birthdate FROM user_data WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_data WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_data ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT username, email, is_active FROM user_data WHERE birthdate < '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_data WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT username, email FROM user_data WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM user_data WHERE birthdate BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';
SELECT username, registration_date FROM user_data ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_data WHERE is_active = FALSE AND registration_date < NOW();
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'j%' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email, password FROM users WHERE email = 'test@example.com';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username IN ('alice', 'bob', 'charlie') ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT u.user_id, u.username, u.email, ur.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT full_name, bio FROM user_profiles WHERE profile_id = 5
SELECT user_id, activity_type FROM user_activities ORDER BY activity_date DESC
SELECT username, email, signup_date FROM users WHERE signup_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE signup_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT users.username, user_profiles.full_name FROM users JOIN user_profiles ON users.user_id = user_profiles.user_id;
SELECT users.username, user_activities.activity_type FROM users JOIN user_activities ON users.user_id = user_activities.user_id WHERE activity_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT users.username, COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM users JOIN user_activities ON users.user_id = user_activities.user_id GROUP BY users.username;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT post_content, created_at FROM posts ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_likes FROM likes GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM comments WHERE comment_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT post_content FROM posts WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT post_id, user_id, count(comment_id) AS total_comments FROM posts JOIN comments ON posts.post_id = comments.post_id GROUP BY post_id, user_id ORDER BY total_comments DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(like_id) AS total_likes FROM likes GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_likes > 10;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT content, created_at FROM posts WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT full_name, bio FROM user_profiles WHERE profile_id = 3;
SELECT post_id, title, created_at FROM posts WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT full_name, bio FROM user_profiles WHERE profile_id > 10 ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT title, content FROM posts WHERE user_id = 3 AND title LIKE '%SQL%' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT post_id, count(comment_id) as num_comments FROM comments GROUP BY post_id HAVING num_comments > 5 ORDER BY num_comments DESC;
